title: Test successful, Celsius drink described
summary:
This video features a young East Asian man with dark, wavy hair, wearing a black zip-up jacket. He is seated indoors, likely in an office or modern room, with a large window behind him showcasing a building exterior.

**Key Objects:**
*   A silver and white can with orange accents and text, possibly an energy drink or sparkling water.

**Key People:**
*   A young East Asian man, appearing to be in his late teens or early twenties.

**Key Actions:**
The man begins the video by waving his right hand. He then looks down, before looking back up and waving his hand again. Following this, he reaches off-screen to retrieve a silver and white can, holding it up directly to the camera to display its label before placing it back down. He maintains a calm and focused demeanor throughout the short clip.
transcript: Oh, no, it works, it works. Hi. This is a this is a test. This is a test. I have a can of Celsius. Um Its flavor is Sparkling Orange.
